name: memento-mori
description: Memento Mori - Funeral Services Marketplace Platform
author: SturmUlrich

scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:vendor" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:server && npm run build:client && npm run build:vendor && npm run build:admin
scripts.lint: npm run lint:server && npm run lint:client && npm run lint:vendor && npm run lint:admin
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:shared && npm run typecheck:server && npm run typecheck:client
scripts.db:migrate: npm run -w apps/server -- prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:migrate:prod: npm run -w apps/server -- prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:push: npm run -w apps/server -- prisma db push
scripts.db:seed: npm run -w apps/server -- prisma db seed
scripts.db:reset: npm run -w apps/server -- prisma migrate reset
scripts.docker:reset: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down -v && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules apps/*/node_modules packages/*/node_modules apps/*/.next apps/*/dist packages/*/dist
